title: Clarity of Lines
description: When some lines blur, others become crystal clear.Absolutely smitten, Thomas Elkin and Cooper Jones have decided they’re prepared to give a relationship a try.What they’re not prepared for is the reaction from their families, who try to force them apart.Both men are about to learn that there are lines that define us. Sometimes the lines blur, sometimes the lines become crystal clear.Publisher's Note: This book was previously released under the same title. It has been re-edited for re-release with Pride Publishing.
author: N.R. Walker
